channel.title: My second phone theme (pedo bear style)
channel.description:
well i have just finished my second phone theme and it is based on pedo bear :) it is for the k550/k550i but im sure it will fit any other ones. I have uploaded my first on and second one. and if you would like to make your own il upload the program i use when i find the install.exe for it.
(im not sure were to post this either)
oh and if you dont trust it just please dont download its as simple as that.
